name: Break Many Bricks
description:
http://upup-games.blogspot.in/2014/08/break-many-bricks.html

Break Many Bricks is a Free , Colourful and fun brick breaking game .

The game is basically a brick breaking game inspired by classic arcade games. you bounce a ball off a paddle at the bottom hitting different colour bricks on the top of the screen. Hitting all the bricks results in completing the level and going to the next. There are 150 levels to complete. Unlike other games, however, is the inclusion of power ups other than extra balls. When you hit a brick, there is a chance that a power up will float downwards towards the paddle, and can be picked up by touching it with the paddle. Certain power ups have positive effects, while others have negative, making it important to try to collect the beneficial power ups while avoiding the detrimental power ups. There are 18 power-ups, either good or bad. For example. Some good power-ups include the blast power Up which destroy bricks around the hit brick and also makes the unbreakable bricks breakable, the magnet, which is able to catch the ball and aim it at any brick that you want to hit, and also the fly through brick which makes the ball pass through bricks.

You can choose 3 power ups out of the 12 power ups at the start of each level which cost you some coins which can be collected in the level or can be purchased.

The Game has 150 levels to start and will be updated regularly.

The Game also has two Game Modes Arcade and Endless.

In arcade your mission is to break all breaks and earn maximum combos and collect all three stars for each level to unlock the next.

In Endless you keep playing all levels until you loose all your lives.Compete on a world leaderboard.
